website_summaries.verdict: Boasting a chill time of 6 hours and keeping beverages hot for up to 3, this stainless steel glass is a must-have.
pros: Works well with both hot or cold beverages
Cup and outer enamel are durable
There are a variety of choices with this cup as its available in a range of colors and patterns
Purchase is accompanied by a securely fit lid
cons: Lid has an opening with no cover, so there is the possibility of a spill

customer_reviews.title: Love the rose gold
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a similar product and they are pretty much the same. The top is a silicon slip lid with a small opening that cannot be covered so it's not spill proof. I got the rose gold and the color coating is solid all around. I placed an ice water cup before going to bed and it was pretty much melted by morning but without any condensation on the outside. The water was still cold but not ice cold. I use it for wine picnics out with the hubby and this definitely feels fancier than those plastic disposable wine cups.
customer_reviews.author: Vino

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This wine glass is exactly what I wanted. I got the rose gold wine glass and it is so pretty. It has a nice shine to it without being overly glittery. It comes with a lid to seal it, although, it does not close. It is well insulated and kept my wine the perfect cool temperature. I have also tried hot chocolate in it. It kept it nice and warm. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany mann

customer_reviews.title: Some cups look different
customer_reviews.text: This is Rose Gold color - super pretty and it does sparkle in the sun. Only thing is it has a silver trim around the top (versus just the color of cup all the way to the top). Another person posted pic of rose gold without the trim. So I ordered and it came with the trim. I am returning and buying another color without trim. Just bummed because I really wanted this color with no silver trim. Other color is the dark red. Its very dark but nice color. It also has some sparkle in the sunlight. Nice cups though! Works great-everyone loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great cups for personalizing
customer_reviews.text: These tumblers make great gift items, I got mine to personalize using my Cricut to include with a bridal shower gift for a friend who loves to drink wine on her porch - she'll never have to worry about breaking a wine glass or spilling! The surface is super smooth, so my vinyl will stay great!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Citko

customer_reviews.title: This tumbler is beautiful and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this tumbler! It is absolutely beautiful and so durable. I've brought it to the beach, out in the boat and used it just around the house. It's never leaked once. My pictures do not do this tumbler justice, the color is breathtaking
customer_reviews.author: nancy acosta

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Got one to bring with when we travel to friends house (I like my own cup). It's still holding up well, no chips, no fading, and keeps my drinks cold.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hough

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT keep your drinks cold. I did make sure it advertised it did. The cup itself is nice. I purchased the Rose gold one. Received it in good condition. Only complaint is that it did not do as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Durable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love this wine glass! I have a baby who loves to grab glasses, I like knowing that I can feel pretty secure knowing he isn’t going to break my glass when I turn my head!
customer_reviews.author: mamajenn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Bought for my wedding absolutely adore these. Had a friend of mine monogram these and they came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Rose gold is gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Love love the color. Only negative is a little hard to hold while drinking and also 12oz is really small. Kinda wish it was 16oz. Next time I'll really read the description
customer_reviews.author: Marielalipp

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Does what is Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love the rose gold color. Keeps liquids cold and fits in my car’s drink holder. Mascot
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Wine tumbler
customer_reviews.text: I received one as a gift a couple years ago. Finally got my mom one for Christmas (Rose color). She is happy! It's very pretty :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it cold!
customer_reviews.text: Great wine glass that keeps it cool while I'm outside on the patio & the color is absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: SchoepFam11

customer_reviews.title: Great, especially for cold drinks
customer_reviews.text: Love this for hot and cold drinks. I do think it keeps cold drinks colder for longer than it keeps hot drinks hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: As nice as expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: One cache damaged, ordered 12 for bachelorette party last minute. Used circuit to add guests initials. Great wine glass or drink sipper. Didn’t return the damaged one but should
customer_reviews.author: Wayneo

customer_reviews.title: perfect cup
customer_reviews.text: these cute little cups are beautiful. i got sparkling pink one and got purple for my hubby. we have almost every drink in these cup these days.
customer_reviews.author: Roja Lamichhane

customer_reviews.title: What a Great cup!!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful ,giftable cup.love the color. drinks cold for the whole day.love love this cup.good for my coffee keeps warm for 12 hours wow will oder more
customer_reviews.author: Mkats

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: It's fun to drink from and it protects your drink from bugs better than using a glass or cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my wine cold for hours :)
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cup. Great price and keeps your drinks cold. I had no issue. No chips on the cup and the rose gold is beautiful. Will be ordering more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Rayza

customer_reviews.title: Nice cup WITH lid
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup and the color. What I love best is that it comes with a lid which is why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Saelens

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mug! I use it for coffee and it definitely keeps it hot for a long time. Very pretty color and the lid is nice. Very pleased and going to buy another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This is just okay for me. Cute and serves a purpose, just expected a nicer quality.
customer_reviews.author: NIC

customer_reviews.title: Keeps mine wine cold 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love my new wine tumbler it really keeps everything cold, and will not spill my wine 👍
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and looks good while doing it
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I needed it to do: carry wine outside where I can drink and not worry about the glass breaking. Plus it’s pretty cool looking. I’ll prob buy some more.
customer_reviews.author: vonmoishe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a Christmas gift. It is a great tumbler
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Radtke

customer_reviews.title: The 12oz size is perfect to make a large drink and take it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't need a stemless wine glass that isn't breakable?? The 12oz size is perfect to make a large drink and take it for a day at the pool/beach/lake. The colors are fun and beautiful. The insulated material is great to keep your drinks cold for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Catherine McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Best cup ever! It just makes you happy! Buy it! I love the rose gold one.
customer_reviews.author: Aim1107

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a wine lover. Great color and seems durable
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty cup but the lid is kind of difficult to drink out of
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Light and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice wine glass. Easy to sip from. It is light and appeared to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie

customer_reviews.title: Taste like metal
customer_reviews.text: Cannot even use this because it gives off such a terrible metallic taste. Missed the return window :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tumbler!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wine tumbler love it! It keeps your wine cold for a long time no worry of it getting warm. Like that it is leak proof. Wish it came with a straw.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: This little tumbler is great for wine, coffee, juice etc. It keeps drinks hot or cold and is a good value. It is easy to carry and great for events.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Seal leaks
customer_reviews.text: I received this just over a week ago and the seal is failing already. Leaks every time i take a sip. Save your money and buy a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Moore

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Used for red wine with no problems. Didn’t dribble out or anything
customer_reviews.author: Matt Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great cup!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy using this cup. Will be my camping buddy this summer. Kept my wine nice and chilled
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Oft

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love mine! I use it for my coffee and it keeps it warm for a long time. It doesn’t fit in all cup holders though, so just be careful of that.
customer_reviews.author: nicole chastain

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Ice melts right away in this tumbler. It does not work like a Yeti or similar. Cute color but that's all.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Color is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a Christmas gift. I personalized it. The color was more beautiful than the picture
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: However...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute cup... however it leaks while drinking, so just be willing to wear what you have inside.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Perry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Produce
customer_reviews.text: I have given several of these as gifts and everyone loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Rose gold wine tumbler
customer_reviews.text: Really like the product, keeps drink cold. Amazing rose gold color
customer_reviews.author: Pspitzer

customer_reviews.title: It sucks...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on an whim cause it was on sale. It sucks. Doesn't keep anything cold or hot, and it leaks like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: rose gold was beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gifts, but the rose gold was beautiful and the recipients really liked them!
customer_reviews.author: A Kositz

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick
customer_reviews.text: Nothing incredibly special but it did the trick. Kept my wine chilled and is a pretty color!
customer_reviews.author: anne warne

customer_reviews.title: Cute great wine glass!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and great for sipping wine on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Charlye Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and easy to hold.
customer_reviews.text: Super excited about this little tumbler. It’s eye catching and great for outdoor activities. Easy handling with a non skip bottom. Also, easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This item is super cute and keeps my drink cold (I haven't tried a hot drink in it yet but I have a feeling it will keep it nice and hot) The things that keep me from giving 5 starts are the fact that it doesn't fit in my car cup holders and doesn't have a closeable lid so of course it tipped and I dumped it in my car, and it is not big enough to put a bottle of beer into. Otherwise the color is perfect and great for used at home!
customer_reviews.author: PSnyder

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not the best heat retention
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color but looks can go just so far. After putting coffee in cup can almost immediately feel warmth on outside. Doubt there is much of an air gap between inside wall and outer wall. Heat does radiate out some but keeps coffee decently warm for the short time I am drinking it. Note I already had a similar item, different brand (which actually has the brand name on the cup so you know they must be proud of it) and used it again this am to compare and during the entire time I drank coffee I never felt any warmth radiate to the outside of cup. Therefore all heat stayed inside eight coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Texark

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's fine I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cheap cup. The biggest issue for me is that it doesn't fit in my cup holder in my Saturn Vue, so I have to carry it in one hand the whole time I drive. The second issue is that the coffee only stays warm for maybe an hour max, if that. My other coffee mugs with a real lid stay hot for multiple hours. Might be ideal for cold drinks in the summer or if you just want something at your desk to get you another thirty minutes with hot coffee. Other than that, it's fine, there are no scratches or anything and it came packaged fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and well-made insulated cup with firm cover
customer_reviews.text: I got the rose gold cup and it looks pretty in the light. It is well-made, smooth, stainless steel and painted on the outside. It is a vacuum insulated cup so it has been great keeping my coffee warm. The lid on top is a hard plastic and has a rubber ring so it fits securely in the cup and doesn’t leak. There is a typical drinking ‘hole’ on the lid and my wish is that it had a shutter/cover on so the beverage doesn’t spill when I am moving around with it.
customer_reviews.author: NWMTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Cold drink turned warm after 2 hours.
customer_reviews.text: This is great IF you’re using ice. The cup was colder than my drink, unfortunately. I have several different tumblers and thought this would be great for my chilled wine. Sometimes it doesn’t take me long tondrunk a glass of wine, other times it may take me a few hours because of distractions, chores, etc. The seal to the lid is very tight, which is nice. It’s easy to use. Unfortunately, it did not keep my wine chilled at all. I’d stick to using it for iced drinks.
customer_reviews.author: PV

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I was given a Corkcicle which is perfect but pricey. This looks the same, but using side by side, Corkcicle product kept drink with ice cold for 6 hours, i.e. still had ice pieces after 6 hours. This glass went for about 2. As well the mouthpiece on lid does not seal...but then Corkcicle's does but not tightly so pretty worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and am disappointed with the quality. The rose color looks worn as if it does not have enough of a color coat. You can see the actual stainless steel color as you get closer to the lip. I have not used it as of yet but hope that it will at least keep the drink cold.
customer_reviews.author: Epesci

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Using this as my morning coffee cup. As usual I pour myself a cup of coffee. I start running around to get ready only to find my coffee has been sitting there and is now cold. Love this cup! The color is vibrant and when I get back to my coffee it is still hot! Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janbo

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT KEEP WINE COLD!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the sole purpose of keeping my wine cold. Sorry to say it failed miserably. I thought this cup would perform as well as my IBEX. The IBEX keeps beverages ice cold for 24 plus hours. This cup is worthless. Am planning to return it tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Functional but cheap
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This cup works, but doesn’t last. Almost immediately the colored film started peeling and after about a month of use (never put it in the dishwasher) the coloring was completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Use It Daily
customer_reviews.text: Love this cup. I use it everyday. Especially like the lid and the way it keeps beverages cold for quite a long time. The only thing I wish I would have done differently would be to buy a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me 2

customer_reviews.title: Well-balanced. Rose-gold is beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and shape for medium female hand. Well-balanced! I love the rose-gold finish (returned another that was sky blue - color seemed a little flat to me). Lid is fine, although I wish there was a closure. Hole on clear plastic lid just stays open.
customer_reviews.author: Mega

customer_reviews.title: Perfect insulated wine glass
customer_reviews.text: I love the pink color. The perfect insulated wine glass. It was a gift; she loved it. Really does keep the liquid cold for hours.
customer_reviews.author: K nurse

customer_reviews.title: Great for romantic getaways!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using my wine tumbler since I got it. You can stick a straw into it if you want. I bought two for a romantic weekend in a cabin in the woods, and can’t wait for my partner to use his. I love the colors. The only thing missing for me is that I wish it was completely spill proof. I can be clumsy. Otherwise, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Vega

customer_reviews.title: Cute champagne or wine glass
customer_reviews.text: Love this little cup, perfect for a mimosa, love the lid!! As long as you don't knock it over it's no going to leak. Keeps it cold and bubbly for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA BUCHANAN

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved this gift.! If your are a wine drinker this is a must have !
customer_reviews.author: kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Lid is not secure!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was very happy wit this cup. Then i took it party and spilled my beverage all over because the lid is not secure!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Werner

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of the wine cup! I’m making a Birthday package for my sister. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Morales

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cup!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup! So far it has held up really well...it works great for hot and cold drinks
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Well it works great for wine, but doesn't keep things hot. Works great for the hot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Pug mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Chipping paint
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this 3 months and the outside paint color is chipping away.
customer_reviews.author: Laysea

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: This wine tumbler leaks. I would not recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Watts

product_meta.title: MASCOTKING 12 oz Wine Tumbler,Double Vacuum Insulated Wine Glass with Lids for Keeping Wine, Coffee, Drinks, Champagne, Cocktails

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars174 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
